title: Injury in sport
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation and Newfilms
brief_description: Using live-action, animation and diagrams, this film clearly outlines many forms of sporting injuries to the bones, joints, ligaments, tendons, muscles and head. Briefly covers treatment and preventive measures.
